Module com.example.turinggame

Package Model

package Model
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    Model.Validator
     
  • Class
    Description
    Code
    The Code class represents a numerical code consisting of three digits.
    Game
    The Game class represents the main logic and state of the game.
    GameFacade
    The GameFacade class provides a simplified interface to the underlying Game class, making it easier to interact with the game's functionality.
    GameState
    The GameState record holds the state of a game at a given moment.
    Problem
    The Problem class represents a specific problem or challenge involving a secret code and a set of validators.
    Round
    The Round class represents a round in a validation process.
    TuringException
    The TuringException class is a custom exception that extends RuntimeException.
